escape.mainTitle: Beware the Tasks That Lurk in Your Mind!
escape.description: No more forgetting! Use powerful spells (a.k.a. natural language) to summon your to-dos into existence. Organize them instantly before they vanish into the abyss of unfinished work. Control your tasks before they control you!

middle.title: The Haunted
middle.title2: List Tasks That Won't Stay Buried!
middle.description: Beware! Your unfinished tasks are rising from the grave... Keep them in check before they haunt you forever! Add, complete, and conquer your to‑dos before they turn into nightmares!

middleBar.card1: “Unfinished tasks will fade and turn into eerie ghost reminders if left too long—don't let them haunt you”
middleBar.card2: “If you ignore your tasks for too long, the screen gets darker, and creepy sounds start playing to remind you to get things done!”
middleBar.card3: “Complete a task, and watch it vanish with a spooky animation—like banishing a ghost back to the underworld!”

panda.redTitle: Capture Tasks Before They Haunt You Forever!
panda.mainTitle: Beware the Tasks That Lurk in Your Mind!
panda.description: Your unfinished tasks are creeping in the shadows, waiting to strike! We've spent years crafting the ultimate ghost-hunting tool—capture and banish tasks instantly before they haunt you forever. Just type naturally, and let the exorcism begin!

emptyTasks.title: No Tasks… Just an Eerie Silence!
emptyTasks.line1: It’s so empty here… almost too empty. Did your tasks vanish into the void?
emptyTasks.line2: Summon a new task before the ghosts start whispering...

deleteStatus.warningLine1: Beware! You’re About to Erase the
deleteStatus.warningDetail: All tasks in this status will vanish into the void forever... Once they’re gone, there’s no bringing them back!
